yaml.title: Technical Competency Matrix
yaml.subtitle: Cloud Architecture | Data Engineering | AI Research

markdown.markdown:
:::{.column-page} **AI & Cloud Engineer** specializing in **production-grade ML systems**. Competencies include **Serverless Architecture** (AWS/GCP), **Data Pipelines**, and **Calibrated Uncertainty Quantification**, validated by **5+ Industry Certifications**. ::: --- ## 1. Cloud & MLOps (AWS/GCP) {#cloud} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications
![](images/AWS Cloud Quest Solutions Architect - Training Badge.png) [**Solutions Architect**](https://www.credly.com/badges/7e7ce948-e01f-4093-b721-569e4a591cfa/public_url)
![](images/AWS Cloud Quest Generative AI Architect - Training Badge.png) [**GenAI Architect**](https://www.credly.com/badges/9c6c38b6-ceb3-43ab-8aa4-60ee9b4bbc01/public_url)
![](images/AWS Academy Graduate - Cloud Foundations - Training Badge.png) [**Cloud Foundations**](https://www.credly.com/badges/1bed2ab6-dfb9-49f3-8801-f67b8c2f55ee/public_url)
![](images/Google Cloud Fundamentals Core Infrastructure.png) [**Google Core Infra**](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/YOUR_PROFILE_LINK_HERE)
::: :::{.g-col-8 .project-card} ### Serverless AI Pipeline (Edge-to-Cloud)
Designed to achieve **sub-100ms defect detection** in manufacturing environments, this pipeline integrates **AWS Greengrass** and **IoT Core** for robust edge computing. By deploying PyTorch models directly to the edge, I eliminated cloud latency, ensuring real-time inference while maintaining a serverless Lambda backend for asynchronous data aggregation and analytics.
![](images/Serverless AI Pipeline for Quality Inspection description.png){group="projects" description="Serverless AI Pipeline Architecture"}
[**View Code on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/Serverless-AI-Pipeline-for-High-Throughput-Quality-Inspection-on-AWS){.btn .btn-primary role="button"}
### Carbon-Aware Agentic Scheduler
A multi-agent system built with **LangGraph** that dynamically schedules AI training jobs based on real-time grid carbon intensity. By integrating "Watcher" and "Scheduler" agents, the system autonomously shifts heavy compute workloads to low-carbon time windows, achieving a demonstrated **13.4% reduction in CO2 emissions** during simulation.
![](images/Carbon-Aware Scheduler System Architecture_diagram.png){group="projects" description="Multi-Agent Scheduler Architecture"}
[**View Code on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/carbon-aware-scheduler){.btn .btn-primary role="button"}
::: ::: --- ## 2. Data Engineering (Pipelines) {#data} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications
![](images/Build a Data Warehouse with BigQuery Skill Badge.png) [**BigQuery Data Warehouse**](https://www.credly.com/badges/77276a92-ba3a-4a75-83c4-dfebfd25be03/public_url)
::: :::{.g-col-8 .project-card} ### EuroAgri Pipeline
I engineered this scalable data system to harmonize heterogeneous geospatial inputs into climate-adaptive agronomic insights. The pipeline features a custom **heuristic imputation engine** for missing soil chemistry data (Nitrogen/Phosphorus) and automates the transformation of raw weather logs into structured **Parquet datasets** and a traversable **Neo4j Knowledge Graph**.
![](images/EuroAgri Pipeline schema_metagraph.png){group="projects" description="EuroAgri Knowledge Graph Schema"}
[**View Code on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/euroagri-pipeline){.btn .btn-success role="button"}
::: ::: --- ## 3. AI Research (Deep Learning) {#ai} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications
![](images/AWS Cloud Quest Machine Learning - Training Badge.png) [**AWS Machine Learning**](https://www.credly.com/badges/30297a53-9f40-4fc8-ab47-17cd0c7723f8/public_url)
![](images/Prompt Design in Vertex AI Skill Badge.png) [**Vertex AI Prompt Design**](https://www.credly.com/badges/71a30456-3491-4f6a-af98-38943291d195/public_url)
::: :::{.g-col-8 .project-card} ### Net-Load Forecasting with MC-Dropout
My Master's dissertation focused on **calibrated uncertainty quantification** for the Irish Power System, moving beyond simple point predictions. I developed a **Monte Carlo Dropout LSTM** network to predict net-load volatility and implemented a **Deep SVDD** (Support Vector Data Description) model for residual-based anomaly detection, statistically outperforming ARIMA-GARCH baselines.
[**Download Dissertation Overview (PDF)**](files/Dissertation 21189676 Muwanguzi Jonathan.pdf){.btn .btn-info role="button"}
::: :::
